data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve sequence enrollments for a contact
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all automation sequence enrollments for a specific contact. Returns a collection of enrollment records showing which sequences the contact is enrolled in, including enrollment status and details. Requires the contact ID as a path parameter.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb, specified what is being retrieved (enrollments for a contact), and clarified the return value to help AI agents understand when to use this operation for fetching contact enrollment data.

data.summary_suggestion: List all automation sequences with filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a paginated list of automation sequences. Supports filtering and sorting through query parameters. Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb (enroll), specified the request schema context, clarified the response, and explained the side effect (initiating automation workflow) to help AI agents understand this is a state-changing operation that starts a sequence for a contact.

data.summary_suggestion: Enroll a contact in an automation sequence
data.description_suggestion: Enrolls a contact in an automation sequence. Accepts a PublicSequenceEnrollmentRequest containing the contact and sequence identifiers. Returns a PublicSequenceEnrollmentResponse with the enrollment details and status. This operation initiates the automation workflow for the specified contact.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description. Added clear action verb (enroll), specified the request schema context, clarified the response, and explained the side effect (initiating automation workflow) to help AI agents understand this is a state-changing operation that starts a sequence for a contact.

data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve details for a specific sequence
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves detailed information about a specific automation sequence by its ID. Returns a PublicSequenceResponse containing the sequence configuration, steps, settings, and other metadata. Use this operation to view the complete definition and structure of an automation sequence.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description.
